languages.text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
languages.original_text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждое убийство. ОП можно использовать даже после совершения атак или применения {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, the Fighter gains +4 MP for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using abilities.
Until the end of combat, the Fighter gains +4 MP for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using abilities.

Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}每击杀一名敌人，就可以获得4点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，这些移动点数可以在攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后使用。此效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战士每击杀一名敌人，就可以获得4点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，这些{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}可以在攻击或使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}之后使用。此效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} obtiene +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} por cada enemigo que mata y puede usar sus PM después de atacar o usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, el guerrero obtiene +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} por cada enemigo que mata y puede usar sus PM después de atacar o usar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘終了まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が敵を倒すたびに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+4増加し、攻撃後または{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用後にMPを使用できる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘終了まで、ファイターが敵を倒すたびに{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+4増加し、攻撃後または{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}使用後に{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}MP{/g}を使用できる。

languages.text: До конца боя {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждое убийство. ОП можно использовать даже после совершения атак или применения {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя боец получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждое убийство. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОП{/g} можно использовать даже после совершения атак или применения {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.

До конца боя боец получает +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} за каждое убийство. {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОП{/g} можно использовать даже после совершения атак или применения {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} erlangt bis zum Ende des Kampfes +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für jeden Kill. Er kann seine BP dann nach dem Angreifen oder dem Gebrauch von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} nutzen.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger erlangt bis zum Ende des Kampfes +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} für jeden Kill. Er kann seine BP dann nach dem Angreifen oder dem Gebrauch von {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} nutzen.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} bénéficie de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour chaque ennemi éliminé et peut utiliser ses PD après avoir attaqué ou utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Combattant bénéficie de +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} pour chaque ennemi éliminé et peut utiliser ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PD{/g} après avoir attaqué ou utilisé ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, çatışma sonuna dek öldürdüğü her düşman için +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır ve saldırdıktan veya {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullandıktan sonra HP'sini kullanabilir.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} gains +4 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} for each kill and may use their MP after attacking or using {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}.
